jobDescription: Business Title Data Analytics Developer Intern  18-May-2018 Requisition Number17855BRJob Description and Requirements This internship offers an opportunity to student to work with a software development team on developing, debugging, and testing Synopsys Insight analytics system. Technical exposures include scalable, highly available, Non-SQL datastores; programming interface development; multi-component software debugging; user requirement analysis, etc. Skill Requirements:Java/Python/C++ programming languagesHands on with problem analysisGood understanding of data structures and algorithm designKnowing RESTFul API, Having Web development experiencePrevious experience with data analytics are preferredEducation Requirements:Must be currently enrolled in a Bachelors program in Computer Science or related majors.Hiring Location USA - California - Mountain View/Sunnyvale Hire Type Intern Job Category Interns/Temp Country United States
